attributes.action: Allow Windows to be broken on Cars that Block Access
attributes.additional_details: People keep parking infront of my garage when I need to go out and gig.  This completely nullifies the point of the garage and my legal access and prevents me from getting to gigs which could potentially lose promoters 100s of £ if I'm driving the other acts.  Clamping wont give me access to my car and I cant afford to tow it.  I think I should have the legal right in this situation if the owner cannot be found to smash the driver near side window, release the handbreak and push the car out the way!
